item.title: Iveco X-Way v1.8 ETS2
item.description:
Iveco X-Way v1.8 ETS2

Mod adds Iveco X-Way to the game
‚Äì 2 —Åabins
‚Äì 3 chassis
‚Äì Default tuning support
‚Äì With permission of the author made adaptation mod under Signs on your Truck
Version 1.8:
‚Äì Mod adapted for patch 1.50

Required game version:
‚Äì 1.50.x + DLC Cabin Accessories



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: SVK MAP by KimiSlimi V.35B/1.50 ‚Äì DEMO/FULL ETS2
item.description:
SVK MAP by KimiSlimi V.35B/1.50 ‚Äì DEMO/FULL ETS2

Hello, my name is KimiSlimi and I‚Äôm is creating a Slovak map for the whole SCS Europe for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2.
I‚Äôm glad, that you are reading this file, because you always find there basic informations about map = how to install a map, changes and updates, or what‚Äôs preparing for the future.

!!! For the correct functionality of the map and all models, I recommend playing with 3 map DLC = Going East, Baltic Sea and Black Sea !!!

Map ‚Äì DEMO ‚Äì V.35B:
‚Äì 18 cities in Slovakia
West Slovakia (6): (Bratislava, Malacky, Trnava, Trenƒç√≠n, Nov√© Z√°mky, Nitra)
Central Slovakia (6): (≈Ωilina, Ru≈æomberok, Bansk√° Bystrica, Zvolen, Brezno, Rimavsk√° Sobota)
East Slovakia (6): (Poprad, Spi≈°sk√° Nov√° Ves, Ko≈°ice, Michalovce, Pre≈°ov, Humenn√©)
‚Äì 1 city in Ukraine (Velykyj Bereznyj)

Map ‚Äì FULL ‚Äì V.35B:
‚Äì 40 cities in Slovakia
West Slovakia (14): (Bratislava, Malacky, K√∫ty, Hol√≠ƒç, Trnava, Senica, Myjava, Nov√© Mesto nad V√°hom, Trenƒç√≠n, Galanta, ≈†aƒæa, Nov√© Z√°mky, Nitra, Prievidza, Handlov√°)
Central Slovakia (10): (≈Ωiar nad Hronom, ≈Ωilina, Ru≈æomberok, Bansk√° Bystrica, Zvolen, Brezno, ƒåierny Balog, Koryt√°rky, Rimavsk√° Sobota, ƒåerven√° Skala)
East Slovakia (15): (Poprad, Spi≈°sk√° Nov√° Ves, Levoƒça, Star√° ƒΩubov≈àa, Sabinov, Ko≈°ice, Trebi≈°ov, Michalovce, Sobrance, Pre≈°ov, Vranov nad Topƒæou, Str√°≈æske, Humenn√©, Snina, Stropkov)
‚Äì 3 cities in Ukraine (Uzhhorod, Velykyj Bereznyj, Uzhhok)

How to install the map properly?
1.) Unpack archive named SVK MAP by KimiSlimi V.xx-x.xx ‚Äì DEMO/FULL
2.) Files mapa_kimislimi.scs, data_kimislimi.scs, lampy_kimislimi.scs and znacky_kimislimi.scs move to directory Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod
3.) Open the game and in mod manager add 4 files active in the order written in 2nd pharagraph
4.) You have the map ready and all you have to do is follow the damn road with truck‚Ä¶no that was a joke = only play it! üòâ

Changes in the V.35B update: (pic. 1,2,3)
‚Äì added section of the R1 expressway in the vicinity of the city of Nitra and a connection to the I/64 road to Nov√© Z√°mky
‚Äì the canceled city of Pova≈æsk√° Bystrica due to game instability and subsequent reworking
‚Äì marked detour between Trenƒç√≠n and ≈Ωilina
‚Äì modified intersection in Uzhhorod towards Velykyj Bereznyj and Mukachevo
‚Äì correction of errors and random crashes of the game
‚Äì update to game version 1.50

What is planned in the future?
‚Äì the last stage of the city of Bratislava = Star√© Mesto, Centrum
‚Äì add the cities of Bardejov, Kom√°rno, Dunajsk√° Streda, Hol√≠ƒç and complete the cities of Trnava and Levice
‚Äì rebuild the oldest cities in Slovakia from 2018/2019 (e.g. Nitra, Poprad, ≈†aƒæa, Galanta, Brezno‚Ä¶)
‚Äì rebuild the city of Ru≈æomberok, Zvolen and Bansk√° Bystrica
‚Äì replace all old traffic signs, roads and lamps with new ones

How do I recommend playing map?
‚Äì If you are on a laptop, I recommend having it plugged in for a better map-playing experience
‚Äì visual settings are best at ‚ÄúHigh‚Äù

Buying a FULL version:
1.) via TRANSFER to the BANK ACCOUNT
‚Äì send 7‚Ç¨ (7.50$) to account numbered SK58 0900 0000 0051 7632 2479
‚Äì to note write your e-mail, to have an abbility send you map
‚Äì updates are included within 1 year from the purchase of map
‚Äì if you do not send the full amount, the map won‚Äôt be sent



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Etnyre Asphalt Tanker 1.50 ATS
item.description:
Etnyre Asphalt Tanker 1.50 ATS

Specifications
Standalone: Yes
Advance Coupling: Yes
Landing Gear Animation: Yes
Axles: 2
Collisions: Yes
Trailer Selection: Yes
Colors: Standard
Color Selection: No
Loads: Asphalt
Wheels: Chrome with Stemco Hubcaps/Chrome with Hendrickson Tiremax Pro

item.title: Animated gates in companies v4.5 ETS2
item.description:
Animated gates in companies v4.5 ETS2

Mod adds to the game more realism, making gates and barriers, many companies are animated! All gates and barriers have a collision, so to fully open do not attempt to drive to the base or to leave. In fashion there are not all companies that are in the game, the mod will be updated!

Version 4.5:
‚Äì Mod adapted for patch 1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Company addon v2.9 ETS2
item.description:
Company addon v2.9 ETS2

Mod adds trucks to base of companies! Trucks change, their position also changes! Works with mod Animated gates in companies! In the mod manager connect above mod Animated gates in companies!

Version 2.9:
‚Äì Mod adapted for patch 1.50
Connect this mod in the manager above the mods Real Company Logo



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
